abstract: Zili Shao, the head of the Asia practice at the law firm Linklaters and a major deal-maker, will lead the bank’s efforts in China.
snippet: Zili Shao, the head of the Asia practice at the law firm Linklaters and a major deal-maker, will lead the bank’s efforts in China.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase has hired Zili Shao, the head of the Asia practice at the law firm Linklaters and a major deal-maker, to lead its own efforts in China.

headline.main: JPMorgan Hires Lawyer as New China Head

keywords.name: organizations
